225.movie_plot: A New York City architect becomes a one-man vigilante squad after his wife is murdered by street punks in which he randomly goes out and kills would-be muggers on the mean streets after dark.

236.movie_plot: Aircraft factory worker Barry Kane goes on the run across the United States when he is wrongly accused of starting a fire that killed his best friend.

203.movie_plot: Adventurers return to the overturned ship, seeking a fortune.

231.movie_plot: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

229.movie_plot: Henpecked Egbert Sousè has comic adventures as a substitute film director and unlikely bank guard.

185.movie_plot: The lives and tragedies of rising and fading country music stars in Nashville, TN.

206.movie_plot: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating the Solaranite (a sort of sun-driven bomb).

226.movie_plot: The sensuous wife of a lunch wagon proprietor and a rootless drifter begin a sordidly steamy affair and conspire to murder her Greek husband.

208.movie_plot: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York to seek personal fortune but, in the process, finds himself a new friend.

220.movie_plot: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

202.movie_plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.

223.movie_plot: A U.S. sub commander, obsessed with sinking a certain Japanese ship, butts heads with his first officer and crew.

211.movie_plot: Two researchers in a green alternative energy project are put on the run when they are framed for murder and treason.

195.movie_plot: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

191.movie_plot: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.

246.movie_plot: A New Englander arrives in the Old West, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

227.movie_plot: A bookish CIA researcher finds all his co-workers dead, and must outwit those responsible until he figures out who he can really trust.

186.movie_plot: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.

224.movie_plot: When a young female doctor notices an unnatural amount of comas occurring in her hospital she uncovers a horrible conspiracy.

210.movie_plot: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

198.movie_plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

218.movie_plot: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring destroys his life outside it.

235.movie_plot: A young woman discovers her visiting uncle may not be the man he seems to be.

241.movie_plot: Herbie, the Volkswagen Beetle with a mind of its own, is racing in the Monte Carlo Rally. Unbeknownst to Herbie's driver, thieves have hidden a cache of stolen diamonds in Herbie's gas tank, and are now trying to get them back.

212.movie_plot: A career thief witnesses a horrific crime involving the U.S. President.

197.movie_plot: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.

213.movie_plot: The living Volkswagen Beetle helps an old lady protect her home from a corrupt developer.

201.movie_plot: A housemaid falls in love with Dr. Jekyll and his darkly mysterious counterpart, Mr. Hyde.

214.movie_plot: While escaping from a foiled robbery attempt, three thieves find themselves surrounded by police at a New Orleans bar--only they're not the people the police are searching for.

216.movie_plot: A rebellious young man takes a job as a nightclub singer to make ends meet, attracting the attention of a local crime boss.

190.movie_plot: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

189.movie_plot: Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

232.movie_plot: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

238.movie_plot: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

233.movie_plot: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

239.movie_plot: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

207.movie_plot: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

219.movie_plot: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what needs to be done with his body...

187.movie_name: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane? (1962)

200.movie_plot: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

222.movie_plot: An elderly professor's ordered life spins dangerously out of control when he falls for a nightclub singer.

205.movie_plot: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

196.movie_plot: Two young siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback and are forced to cope on their own. They meet an Australian boy on "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.

244.movie_plot: A famous fashion photographer develops a disturbing ability to see through the eyes of a killer.

194.movie_plot: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

242.movie_plot: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

240.movie_name: In the Realm of the Senses (Ai no corrida) (1976)
240.movie_plot: A passionate telling of the story of Sada Abe, a woman whose affair with her master led to a sexual obsession which then came to a violent end.

188.movie_plot: A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.

209.movie_plot: Film noir parody with a detective uncovering a sinister plot. Characters from real noirs appear as scenes from various films are intercut.

12.movie_plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

63.movie_plot: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.

179.movie_plot: When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.

118.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

2.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

144.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

133.movie_plot: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

55.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

0.movie_name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)
0.movie_plot: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

9.movie_plot: When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends vow to rescue him, but Woody finds the idea of immortality in a museum tempting.

161.movie_plot: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

130.movie_plot: Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.

37.movie_plot: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

151.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

16.movie_plot: A shady police detective finds himself in the middle of a murder conspiracy at an important boxing match in an Atlantic City casino.

174.movie_plot: A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife.

14.movie_plot: When a Roman General is betrayed, and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

90.movie_plot: A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

183.movie_plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

173.movie_plot: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

129.movie_plot: A violent, suspended police detective investigates a brutal murder, in which a manipulative and seductive woman could be involved.

99.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

70.movie_plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.

81.movie_plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

85.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

83.movie_plot: Two straight men mistakenly end up on a "gays only" cruise.

62.movie_plot: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

30.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

103.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

38.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

60.movie_plot: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

92.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

18.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

56.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)

75.movie_plot: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

147.movie_plot: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

4.movie_plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazi Germans.

58.movie_plot: As corruption grows in 1950s LA, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

29.movie_plot: Bonnie Parker, a bored waitress falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, robbing cars and banks.

162.movie_plot: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

112.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

139.movie_plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

135.movie_plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

87.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

1.movie_plot: When a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

164.movie_plot: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.

64.movie_plot: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

120.movie_plot: James Bond teams up with the lone survivor of a destroyed Russian research center to stop the hijacking of a nuclear space weapon by a fellow Agent formerly believed to be dead.

167.movie_plot: A semi-fictional account of life as a professional Football (American-style) player. Loosely based on the Dallas Cowboys team of the early 1970s.

104.movie_plot: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

24.movie_plot: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

148.movie_plot: Remake of the 1958 sci-fi horror classic about a deadly blob from another planet which consumes everything in its path. Teenagers attempt without success to warn the townspeople, who refuse to take them seriously.

113.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
113.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

131.movie_plot: Two girls have an intense fantasy life; their parents, concerned the fantasy is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.

52.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

98.movie_plot: A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

25.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
25.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

156.movie_plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.

184.movie_plot: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

19.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

93.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

51.movie_plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.

3.movie_plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

127.movie_plot: An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.

95.movie_plot: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

21.movie_plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

180.movie_plot: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

134.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

108.movie_plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

124.movie_plot: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

146.movie_name: Creature From the Black Lagoon, The (1954)
146.movie_plot: A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.

54.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

101.movie_plot: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

159.movie_plot: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

32.movie_plot: A man visits his old friend's hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

182.movie_plot: When a reformed jewel thief is suspected of returning to his former occupation, he must ferret out the real thief in order to prove his innocence.

89.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

71.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

116.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

166.movie_plot: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.
